resources: Read Card Sign Personalize Depersonalize Create wallet Purge wallet Read issuer data Write issuer data Read issuer extra data Write issuer extra data Read user data Write user data â€‹ This command returns all data about the card and the wallet, including unique card number (CID) that has to be submitted while calling all other commands Depending on Signing_Method parameter defined during personalization, this command signs data using Wallet_PrivateKey Personalization is an initialization procedure, required before start using a card. During this procedure all card setting are performed. During this procedure all data exchange are encrypted because it\'s usually done at the third-party factory. This command reset card to initial state - erase all data, writed during previous personalization and previous usage. \nCommand available on SDK cards only SomeDescription SomeDescription SomeDescription SomeDescription SomeDescription SomeDescription SomeDescription SomeDescription
